title: Set math problem solver as default landing page

requirements.text: Configure the default route in App.tsx to navigate to the math problem solver (/math) instead of the current landing page when users first open the application

quotes: make it so when you get in the app you are in the math problem solving thing

acceptanceCriteria: Opening the application URL without any path navigates directly to /math
The MathProblemSolver component loads immediately on app launch
No intermediate landing page or welcome screen is shown

constraints: Do not modify the MathProblemSolver component itself
Preserve all existing routes and navigation structure
Maintain compatibility with the TanStack Router configuration
nonGoals: Changing the math problem solver functionality
Removing other routes or navigation options
Modifying the Header or sidebar navigation
